This work is affiliated with the manuscript titled: **A plain language review and guidance for modeling animal habitat-selection**.

The code from the Github repository [Habitat-Selection-Guidance](https://github.com/bgerber123/Habitat-Selection-Guidance/) includes two R markdown files. The compiled HTML files can be accessed here:


1. [Traditional HSF](TraditionalHSF.html)
  
2. [Movement-based HSF](MovementHSF.html)
